ygData.subject: Re: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a woodelf druid, and I have a bloodforge hammer, which I love. What I m confused about is this whole kiting thing -- I tried it today, and every time I d
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a woodelf druid, and I have a bloodforge hammer, which I love.

What I'm confused about is this whole kiting thing -- I tried it today, and
every time I'd stop to cast a new damage spell, I'd get hit and my spell
would be interrupted before I cast it. Any suggestions? What am I doing
wrong here?



----- Original Message -----
From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 12:26 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting


> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Ok, how does one get a woodelf druid to lvl 14 quickly? What items are
best
> for this race/class? I can probably get a screaming mace (can druids use
> them?) and whatever kind of armor is best for Druid types. What should I
> kill at what levels would also help LOTS.
>
> Thanks lots,
> Omeg
